document_data.mainbody:
owsar Ostramarr was a War Wizard of Cormyr in the late 14 century DR.
He liked to spend time at The Downed Falcon, a tavern.
One of the Waterdhavian thief Narnra Shalaces first assignments as a spy for the Royal Magician of Cormyr, Caladnei was to eavesdrop Bowsar Ostramarr, among others.
